item.title: Getting Started with Manim: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Learn how to create stunning mathematical animations using Manim, a powerful Python library. This step-by-step guide will walk you through the process of setting up Manim and creating your first animation, providing code examples and practical tips along the way.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
